### Item (a)

```{r}
f <- function(t, l = 1) ifelse(t > 0, exp(-l*t), 0)
h <- function(t) ifelse(abs(t) <= 1, 1, 0)

t <- seq(-5, 5, l = 100)
plot(t, h(t), type = "l", ylab = "h(t) - red; f(t) - black")
lines(t, f(t), col = "red")
```
